H0.text: In Greek mythology who was the twin of Polydeuces. Apollo

H1.text: In Greek mythology who was the twin of Polydeuces. Ares

H2.text: In Greek mythology who was the twin of Polydeuces. Dionysus

H3.text: In Greek mythology who was the twin of Polydeuces. Castor

A4.text: Castor and Pollux (or Polydeuces) are twin half-brothers in Greek and Roman mythology

A5.text: Castor was the mortal son of Tyndareus, while Pollux was the divine son of Zeus

A6.text: The pair are thus an example of heteropaternal superfecundation
